name: NADA Data Catalog (Demo Instance)
description: NADA is an open-source web-based data cataloging application. It is used to create portals that allow readers to browse, search, compare, apply for access, and download research data. NADA adheres to the DDI metadata standard and is designed to improve the quality and availability of survey data, reducing inconsistencies in analytical work and enabling more efficient access to survey information such as reports, tables, and microdata.
